modName: The Elder Scrolls V - Italian Translations
summary: Traduzioni complete di Mods abbastanza famose per rendere più scorrevole il Gameplay.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://s14.postimg.org/wr5c72ixt/tes_v_skyrim_dragon_logo_by_carudo_d36lszp.png[/img][/center][center][size=6][color=#0B5394][i][b]
[/b][/i][/color][img]http://s7.postimg.org/t6i0fdkez/cooltext152417562810125.png[/img]
[size=2][i]Traduzioni complete di Mods per rendere più scorrevole il Gameplay.[/i]
[size=5][color=#980000][i][size=2](Warning for all Original Authors: [/size][/i][i][size=2]This page contain only translations of others English mods. Your names and original links of the mods will be included)

[color=#ff7700][size=6][size=2][size=5][i][size=2]([/size][/i][i][size=2]I tempi di rilascio delle release può variare. In caso di "vacanza" o piccola pausa gli utenti verranno avvisati tramite la descrizione. Grazie e soprattutto mettete un Endorse!)[/size][/i][/size][/size][/size][/color]
[/size][/i][/color][/size][/size][/size][font=Comic Sans MS][i][b][size=6]
[color=#00ff00][img]http://s15.postimg.org/elt0yibrv/cooltext152418386321809.png[/img]
[/color][/size][/b][/i][/font][u][i][b][url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/user/19578774-trollbuono/]FreddieMercury99[/url] (Capo delle Operazioni)[u][i][b]
[url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/user/2169509-karunaz/]Karunaz[/url] (Collaboratore)[/b][/i][/u]



[/b][/i][/u][font=Comic Sans MS][i][b][size=6][color=#00ff00][img]http://s13.postimg.org/40bbik0d3/cooltext152418830331476.png[/img]
[/color][/size][/b][/i][b][size=6][color=#00ff00][color=#3d85c6][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59849/?]Perkus Maximus[/url] a cura di FreddieMercury99 ([color=#00ff00]46% - Costruzione[/color])[/size][/color]
[/color][/size][/b][/font]
[font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=6][color=#00ff00][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=6][color=#00ff00][color=#3d85c6][size=3][color=#1e84cc][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70142/?]The Notice Board[/url] [/color]a cura di Karunaz ([color=#00ff00]30% - Costruzione[/color])[/size][/color][/color][/size][/b][/font]
[font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=6][color=#00ff00][color=#3d85c6][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70219/?]The Forgotten City[/url] ([color=#ff0000]-0% - Valutazione[/color])[/size][/color][/color][/size][/b][/font]

[img]http://s10.postimg.org/hsxy3la09/cooltext152419057553684.png[/img][font=Comic Sans MS][i][b][size=6][color=#00ff00]
[/color][/size][/b][/i][/font][color=#3d85c6][size=3]RPG - Italia : [/size][/color][color=#ff7700][url=http://forum.rpgitalia.net/topic/27376-the-elder-scrolls-v-italian-translations/][size=3][ Click ][/size][/url][/color]
[font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=6][color=#00ff00][color=#3d85c6][size=3]Forum Ufficiale : [/size][/color][/color][/size][/b][/font][url=http://tesv-it.forumfree.it/][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=6][color=#00ff00][color=#3d85c6][size=3][/size][/color][/color][/size][/b][/font][color=#ff7700][size=3][ Click ][/size][/color][/url]


[/color][/size][/b][/font][b]

[/b][font=Comic Sans MS][i][b][size=6][color=#00ff00][img]http://s14.postimg.org/s3adrrrup/cooltext152420927332505.png[/img]
